common.disclaimer: Risk signals only — not financial advice.
common.noTracking: No tracking. No cookies. No data stored.

home.tagline: Paste any crypto URL, contract address, transaction hash, or wallet address to scan for risk signals.

scanForm.placeholder: Paste a URL, contract address, tx hash, or wallet address...
scanForm.emptyError: Please enter a URL, contract address, transaction hash, or wallet address
scanForm.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

report.noFindings: All checks passed — no issues detected.
report.passedChecks: +{count} passed checks with no score impact
report.noInput: No input provided. Go back to the scanner to run a scan.
report.scanFailed: Failed to generate report. Please try again.

scoreExplainer.safe: Low-risk signals. No guarantee of safety.
scoreExplainer.suspicious: Potential scam or manipulation signals detected.
scoreExplainer.heuristicNote: Scores are heuristic-based and not financial advice.

findings.no_https: Site does not use HTTPS encryption
findings.unicode_domain: Domain contains non-ASCII (unicode) characters — possible homoglyph/punycode attack
findings.punycode_domain: Domain uses punycode encoding (xn--) — may be disguising unicode characters
findings.subdomain_spoof: Subdomain impersonates "{brand}" — the actual domain is {domain}
findings.many_hyphens: Domain contains {count} hyphens — common in phishing URLs
findings.many_numbers: Domain contains many numbers — common in scam URLs
findings.private_ip: URL points to a private or reserved IP address — blocked for safety.
findings.redirect_non_http: URL redirects to non-HTTP scheme ({scheme}) — blocked for safety.
findings.redirect_private_ip: URL redirects to a private or reserved IP address — blocked for safety.
findings.redirect_loop: URL redirect loop detected — the URL redirects back to a previously visited address.
findings.redirect_same_domain: URL redirects to a different path on the same domain (common behavior).
findings.redirect_suspicious_tld: URL redirects to a different domain with suspicious TLD ({host}) — high phishing risk.
findings.redirect_different_domain: URL redirects to a different domain — phishing risk.
findings.multiple_redirects: URL performs multiple redirects (may indicate tracking or obfuscation).
findings.timeout_untrusted: URL unreachable (timeout after {seconds}s) — cannot verify safety
findings.dns_failed_untrusted: URL unreachable (DNS resolution failed) — domain may not exist
findings.connection_error_untrusted: URL unreachable (connection error) — cannot verify safety
findings.goplus_phishing: URL flagged as phishing by GoPlus security database
findings.goplus_not_phishing: Not found in GoPlus phishing database
findings.gov_not_flagged: Not found in ASIC or AMF government scam databases
findings.ip_address_url: URL uses an IP address instead of a domain name
findings.no_liquidity_pairs: DexScreener returned no liquidity pairs — token may be unlisted or a scam
findings.token_no_pairs: Token has no liquidity pairs on DexScreener
findings.incomplete_data: Token data is incomplete — API returned unexpected format.
findings.pair_extremely_new: Token pair is extremely new ({age} old)
findings.pair_very_new: Token pair is very new ({age} old)
findings.high_volatility: Token shows high 24h volatility (±{change}%) — increased risk.
findings.moderate_volatility: Token shows moderate 24h volatility (±{change}%) — increased risk.
findings.high_fdv_low_liquidity: FDV (${fdv}) is very high relative to liquidity (${liquidity}) — high rug pull risk
findings.honeypot: Token flagged as HONEYPOT by GoPlus — cannot sell
findings.not_open_source: Contract source code is NOT verified/open source
findings.mintable: Token supply can be minted (increased) by owner
findings.slippage_modifiable: Token slippage can be modified by owner
findings.transfer_pausable: Token transfers can be paused by owner
findings.proxy_contract: Contract is a proxy — logic can be changed
findings.selfdestruct: Contract contains selfdestruct — can be destroyed
findings.blacklisted: Token uses a blacklist — your address could be blocked
findings.goplus_audit_passed: GoPlus security audit passed — no red flags detected
findings.sourcify_verified: Contract source code verified on Sourcify
findings.dexscreener_timeout: DexScreener API request timed out — unable to verify token safety
findings.api_unavailable: Could not fetch token data — external API unavailable
findings.baseline_token: Baseline risk floor (no token is truly zero-risk)
findings.baseline_nft: Baseline risk floor (no NFT contract is truly zero-risk)
findings.baseline_address: Baseline risk floor (no address is truly zero-risk)
findings.nft_malicious: NFT contract flagged as MALICIOUS by GoPlus
findings.nft_transfer_no_approval: Contract can transfer NFTs WITHOUT owner approval
findings.nft_oversupply: Contract can mint beyond declared max supply
findings.nft_privileged_minting: Admin can mint NFTs at will (privileged minting)
findings.nft_trust_list: NFT collection is on the GoPlus trust list
findings.nft_copycat: {count} copycat collection(s) detected with the same name — verify you have the original
findings.nft_audit_passed: GoPlus NFT security audit passed — no red flags detected
findings.wallet_is_token: This address is also a token contract with active trading pairs
findings.wallet_clean: Address not flagged in GoPlus security database
findings.ens_no_address: Cannot assess wallet risk without a resolved address
findings.invalid_loss_warning: Sending funds to an invalid address could result in permanent loss
findings.unknown_format: Address format not recognized — chain may not be supported yet.
findings.unknown_not_supported: Address format detected but blockchain not supported
findings.unknown_no_match: Input does not match any known format (URL, contract, tx hash, wallet)
findings.solana_pair_new: Token pair created {age} ago — extremely new
findings.solana_pair_very_new: Token pair created {age} ago — very new
findings.solana_high_fdv: High FDV (${fdv}M) with low liquidity (${liquidity}) — exit liquidity risk
findings.solana_timeout: DexScreener API timed out — could not fetch token data
findings.solana_fetch_failed: Failed to fetch token data from DexScreener

recommendations.no_https: Avoid entering any personal information on non-HTTPS sites
recommendations.homoglyph_explain: Homoglyph attacks use lookalike characters to impersonate legitimate sites
recommendations.check_domain: Check the actual domain name, not just the subdomain — scammers use subdomains to mimic trusted brands
recommendations.suspicious_tld: Be cautious with uncommon domain extensions often used in scams
recommendations.scam_keywords: URLs with these keywords are frequently associated with phishing attacks
recommendations.verify_redirect: Be cautious with redirecting URLs — verify the final destination
recommendations.exercise_caution: Could not verify this URL — exercise extra caution
recommendations.verify_urls: Always verify URLs before connecting your wallet
recommendations.no_seed_phrase: Never enter your seed phrase on any website
recommendations.bookmark_trusted: Bookmark trusted sites to avoid phishing links
recommendations.gov_databases: Cross-check with government scam databases (DFPI, CFTC, SEC, FCA, ASIC, AMF) for additional verification
recommendations.no_raw_ip: Legitimate sites rarely use raw IP addresses
recommendations.bot_protection: Server returned HTTP {status} — likely bot protection. Try visiting manually in your browser.
recommendations.verify_block_explorer: Do not interact with this token unless verified on a block explorer
recommendations.verify_contract: Verify the contract address on a block explorer
recommendations.no_unverified_funds: Do not send funds to unverified contracts
recommendations.new_tokens_scam: Extremely new tokens are very likely to be scams or rug pulls
recommendations.new_tokens_risk: New tokens are significantly more likely to be scams or rug pulls
recommendations.low_liquidity_scam: Tokens with very low liquidity can be easily manipulated or are likely scams
recommendations.low_liquidity_impact: Low liquidity makes it difficult to sell without large price impact
recommendations.pump_warning: Extreme price pumps are often followed by dumps — be very cautious
recommendations.dump_warning: Large price drops may indicate a rug pull or whale dumping
recommendations.high_fdv_warning: A very high FDV with low liquidity means the token could crash easily
recommendations.honeypot_warning: HONEYPOT: This token cannot be sold once purchased — do not buy
recommendations.check_verified: Check if the contract is verified on the block explorer
recommendations.locked_liquidity: Look for locked liquidity before investing
recommendations.never_invest_more: Never invest more than you can afford to lose
recommendations.manual_verify: Manually verify this token on DexScreener or a block explorer
recommendations.nft_malicious: Do NOT interact with this NFT contract — it has been flagged as malicious
recommendations.nft_steal: This contract can steal your NFTs — do not approve or interact
recommendations.nft_dilute: Admin-only minting can dilute the collection value
recommendations.nft_copycat: Verify the contract address matches the official collection — copycats exist
recommendations.nft_marketplace: Check the NFT collection on OpenSea or other marketplaces for community verification
recommendations.nft_verify_explorer: Verify the contract on the block explorer before interacting
recommendations.nft_airdrops: Be cautious of free NFT airdrops — they are often scam vectors
recommendations.nft_approve: Never approve a contract without understanding what permissions you are granting
recommendations.wallet_check_explorer: Check this address on block explorers to see transaction history
recommendations.wallet_revoke: Use revoke.cash to review and revoke any token approvals granted to this address
recommendations.wallet_caution: Be cautious if this address contacted you claiming to be support or offering free tokens
recommendations.no_private_key: Never share your private key or seed phrase with anyone
recommendations.wallet_report_scam: If you suspect this address is associated with a scam, report it on the relevant block explorer
recommendations.tx_verify: Verify the transaction on a block explorer to see full details
recommendations.tx_check_approvals: Check if the transaction involves token approvals — revoke unlimited approvals at revoke.cash
recommendations.tx_approve_warning: Look for "approve" or "setApprovalForAll" function calls — these grant spending permission to another address
recommendations.tx_unlimited_warning: Unlimited approvals (max uint256) are especially risky — prefer setting exact amounts
recommendations.tx_verify_spender: Verify the spender address is a known, legitimate contract (check labels on the block explorer)
recommendations.tx_unfamiliar: If you see an unfamiliar contract as the spender, do not interact further
recommendations.tx_paste_wallet: Paste any wallet address from this transaction into ChainShield to check it against security databases
recommendations.btc_verify: Verify this address on a Bitcoin block explorer before sending funds
recommendations.btc_double_check: Double-check the full address before every transaction — Bitcoin transactions are irreversible
recommendations.ens_verify: Verify the name is registered at app.ens.domains
recommendations.ens_misspelled: If this name was shared with you, be cautious — it may be intentionally misspelled
recommendations.invalid_double_check: Double-check the address before sending funds. Funds sent to invalid addresses cannot be recovered.
recommendations.invalid_verify_source: Verify the address with the sender or original source
recommendations.invalid_no_manual: Never manually type blockchain addresses — always copy and paste
recommendations.invalid_check_network: Check that you are using the correct blockchain network
recommendations.unknown_provide_input: Please provide a URL, contract address, transaction hash, or wallet address
recommendations.unknown_chain_explorer: Look up this address on a chain-specific block explorer
recommendations.unknown_supported: ChainShield currently supports EVM (0x...) and Bitcoin addresses
recommendations.unknown_check_input: Ensure your input is a valid URL, EVM contract address (0x... 42 chars), transaction hash (0x... 66 chars), or wallet address
recommendations.unknown_typos: Double-check for typos or extra spaces
recommendations.solana_verify_explorer: Do not interact with this token unless verified on a Solana explorer
recommendations.solana_verify_mint: Verify the mint address on solscan.io or solana.fm
recommendations.solana_check_project: Check if the token has a verified project on DexScreener
recommendations.solana_slippage: Low liquidity tokens have high slippage — use small position sizes
recommendations.solana_pump_warning: Extreme price pumps often precede dumps — exercise extreme caution
recommendations.solana_volume_warning: Low volume makes it difficult to exit positions at fair price
recommendations.solana_rugcheck: Solana tokens cannot currently be checked for honeypot — verify on rugcheck.xyz
recommendations.solana_try_again: Try scanning again — the data source may be temporarily unavailable
recommendations.solana_verify_solscan: Verify the token on solscan.io for detailed contract info

privacyBanner.message: Privacy First — Zero tracking, zero cookies, zero data stored

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Head back to the scanner to check a URL, token, or wallet address.

about.metaDescription: Learn how ChainShield scans crypto URLs, tokens, transactions, and wallets for scam patterns. Free, open-source, and privacy-first.
about.title: About ChainShield
about.subtitle: Crypto safety checks without tracking.
about.whatIsThisText: A free, privacy-first tool that helps you check whether a crypto link, token contract, transaction, or wallet address looks safe — before you connect your wallet or send funds.
about.step1: Paste any URL, contract address (ETH/BSC/Polygon/Arbitrum), transaction hash, or wallet address into the input box.
about.step2: The app auto-detects what you pasted and runs the appropriate scanner.
about.step3: You get an instant Safety Report with a risk score, findings, and clear recommendations.
about.step4: Nothing is stored. Your scan is processed and immediately discarded.
about.urlItems: Suspicious TLDs (.xyz, .top, .click)|Scam keywords|Unicode/homoglyph attacks|Subdomain spoofing|IP-based URLs|HTTPS verification|Redirect chains|Phishing database check (GoPlus)
about.tokenItems: Liquidity analysis (DexScreener)|24h volume checks|Price pump/dump detection|Pair age analysis|FDV-to-liquidity ratio|Honeypot detection (GoPlus)|Buy/sell tax analysis|Contract verification (Sourcify)|Multi-chain support
about.txItems: Hash format validation|Auto chain detection|Multi-chain explorer links|Approval safety guidance
about.walletItems: Address checksum validation|EVM + BTC support|Malicious activity detection (GoPlus)|Multi-chain explorer links (6 chains)
about.limitationsText: This tool provides risk signals, not guarantees. A "SAFE" rating does not mean a project is legitimate — it means we did not detect known scam patterns. Always do your own research (DYOR) before interacting with any smart contract or sending funds.
about.disclaimerFooter: This tool provides risk signals, not financial advice.

privacy.metaDescription: ChainShield privacy policy. Zero tracking, zero cookies, zero data stored. Your scans are processed and immediately discarded.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.commitmentText: ChainShield is built with privacy as a core principle, not an afterthought. We believe you should be able to check if something is a scam without becoming a target yourself.
privacy.howScansIntro: When you submit a scan, here is exactly what happens:
privacy.scanStep1: Your input is sent to our server for processing
privacy.scanStep2: We analyze the input using public, free APIs (DexScreener, GoPlus Security, Sourcify)
privacy.scanStep3: We generate a safety report based on the analysis
privacy.scanStep4: The report is sent back to your browser
privacy.scanStep5: Your input and the report are immediately discarded — nothing is saved
privacy.thirdPartyIntro: To generate scan reports, we may query the following public APIs:
privacy.dexScreenerDesc: for token trading pair data (public, no authentication required)
privacy.goPlusDesc: for phishing URL detection, token security audits, and malicious wallet checks (public, no authentication required)
privacy.sourcifyDesc: for smart contract source code verification (public, no authentication required)
privacy.blockExplorersDesc: we provide links but do not make API calls on your behalf
privacy.thirdPartyNote: These services have their own privacy policies. We do not send any identifying information about you to these services.
privacy.shareableReportsText: When you use the "Share Link" feature, the report data is encoded in the URL itself using query parameters. No data is stored on our servers. Anyone with the link can see the report, but we have no record of it.
privacy.sessionStorageIntro: This application uses browser session storage for two purposes only:
privacy.recentScansDesc: your last 5 scan inputs are stored so you can quickly re-scan them during the same session
privacy.bannerDismissalDesc: remembers if you dismissed the privacy banner so it stays hidden during navigation
privacy.sessionStorageNote: Session storage is automatically cleared when you close your browser tab. No data is stored in local storage, IndexedDB, or any persistent storage. No scan results or report data are ever saved.
privacy.openSourceText: This tool is designed to be transparent. You can inspect the source code to verify that we do exactly what we claim — no hidden tracking, no secret data collection.
privacy.footerNote: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can review the source code directly. We believe in transparency through code, not just words.
